summary: This mod replaces some sabre cat sounds with domestic cat sounds.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces some sabre cat sounds with domestic cat sounds. (Video now available! Click [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/managevideos/?id=51144]here[/url].)

A picture of the sabre cat sounds that have been replaced is included in the folder labelled "pics".

[b]-HOW TO INSTALL-
[/b][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/managevideos/?id=51144](WATCH THE VIDEO HERE!)[/url][/i]
1. Open Windows Explorer and navigate to C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\sound\fx .
2. Copy the folder labelled "Meowmod" into the window.
3. Navigate to C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data .
4. Copy "Meowmod.esp" into the window.
5. Load up Skyrim, and you're good to go!

Please contact me on the NexusMods if you need help or have questions/problems instead of leaving a bad review. I will do my best to resolve your situation.
__________
Disclaimer: I own none of the cat sounds used in this mod, and use them under a Creative Commons license. The mod was created by me, meluvcheese22, and was not stolen. Please credit me if you create a variation of this mod.
Cat sounds from: http://www.kessels.com/catsounds/
author: meluvcheese22 - Angelica
